content.detailedDescription:
On the 28th of mar about 9 pm i headed out to my greenhouse to put some wood
in the furnace. i was coming back to the house about 9:15 pm (approx. i was walking up the drive heading west. as i approached the walk to the front door i noticed good sized red and white lights through some tree limbs. i stopped to get a better look and thought to myself what kind of airplane is this. i moved to the right a step or two to get a better look at this object. that's when i saw the four red and white lights. i was looking through some large limbs and couldn't get a real good look. i moved to the left three or four steps to get out of the heavy limbs. as soon as i moved to get a better unobstructed view the lights (object?) moved with me so i could get a better look. these lights weren't any higher than maybe 100 ft or so and seemed to be just across the road in the field. this all transpired in a time frame of
about 10 to 15 seconds. a few seconds after the lights moved with me they disappeared. the lights just turned off. i didn't see anything or hear anything. the sky was clear  with no moon at this time. i live just east of the grissom afb about four miles off the runway. that was why my first thought was an airplane. after the lights went out i stood and scanned the heavens for something else or the same thing. nothing happened so i went into the house to tell my wife what i had just witnessed. i was excited and she got excited about the experience. i went back out to scan the sky again for about another ten minutes. my red/white lights didn't materialize. however: to the southwest to grissom afb i witnessed what appeared to be a falling star in reverse. it was just a white light that i observed coming from close to the ground and rising straight up to a good substantial altitude and then the light disappeared. i was really excited. the last time that i had witnessed any ufo type of activity was in jan 1968 in vietnam. i also must tell you that my wife and i are intuitive and on some level psychic. when i asked my mind how many i saw that night, my minds eye told me that there were actually three citings. but i can only recall the two. so now i am very diligent when i go out at night. also that night our dog drove us crazy wanting to go outside. he wanted a revolving door that evening. he would go out and stand at the end of the deck and just look in the sky. we have a lot of spirits hang around our property. i thought they were bothering him which they do alot. i told them to go back to the garden and leave the dog alone. now i know it wasn't the ornery spirits.
content.summary: Witnessed two sets of horizontal-paralel lights. four red lights on top and four white lights on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: It was dusk and i was only about 5 years old and playing on the see-saw with my younger brother when this large saucer shaped object with rectangular lights around the edge appeared from the west, over the trees, flying east it disappeared over the trees behind our house.  it was north of our house but flying from west to east at a slow but steady pace just above the trees.  of course scared to death i hopped off the see-saw and dumped my brother on the ground and ran up the back steps past my grandmother and into the house.  my brother never saw it because his back was to it but he remembers being dumped on the ground.  my grandmother lived out of state, but was there watching us that night so my parents could go to a party.  for years later i always remembered it but everyone thought i was crazy if i mentioned it so i never talked about it.  i rarely saw my grandmother and years later had even forgotten that she had been there.  one night more than 30 years later, my mom and dad stopped by my house with my grandmother.  we were standing around talking and out of the blue my grandmother said "remember the night the flying saucer flew over the house?"  my mom and dad looked at her like she was crazy, most likely the way they did 30 years before when she probably told dad the next morning when he was driving her home on his way to work.  she was discribing what happened.  after so many years of no one talking about it, i was beginning to think i must have dreamed it or something, even though i always knew it was real.  i confirmed her story to my mom and dad.  then my mother tells me, years ago, buck werner that ran the local country store, told her that a flying saucer had landed in the field next to his house one night.  well the one i saw was just above the trees and headed straight towards bucks house which was less than a mile away.  of course this being more than 30 years later, buck was now dead and his children had moved away from the area.  i would have loved to have known about this years before, to ask buck question about it.  i always believed it was something government related due to being so close to washington d.C. and the proximity to so many military installations.  i am not sure of the year, i just know i was very young so it was in the early 60's.
content.summary: Large saucer shape with rectagular lights around the edge just above the trees

content.detailedDescription:
This concerns the photograph from capitola, ca.

i saw that object in a dream (or maybe it wasn't) when i was still living in san pedro, ca. the dream lasted only a few minutes (i think)  two greys had this object suspended between them.  in the dream, they looked at me.  i awakened immediately afterwards, shaking uncontrollably.

it had such a profound effect on me that after i moved to sedona, az. a week later to take care of my mother, i had it made by will lawrence, a man who lived in sedona.  i'm trying to locate will but he's moved and i have no idea where he lives.

it is sitting in my garage at the moment, and looks so similar, that i nearly fainted when i saw the capitola photograph.  don't think i'm crazy, please, but mine is a navigation wheel.  don't ask me how i know that.  i just know it's a navigation wheel.  

mine has the exact same blank space from 'noon' to '3pm' as the capitola photograph, with spokes all the way around.

i have a digital camera but i missplaced the hook-up to attach the camera to the computer.  i'll get one tomorrow and email the photograph of my wheel if you think it worthy.  or an investigator from this area can contact me (pardon the pun).
content.summary: Something very similar to the capitola object is sitting in my garage

content.detailedDescription: 2am eastern time there was a very bright dot in the sky. it seemed to come down to earth slowly fading into darkness within 2 minutes it was faded to half its brightness.
content.summary: Very bright and faded within two minutes

content.detailedDescription: While riding in the car with my dad and sister, my sister pointed out a disc over the tree tops.  it was red, white and silver. we watched it  hover over the trees and lost sight of it in the trees.  this was around 11:00 am in the summer of 2003 while we were driving to our campsite.
content.summary: Saw silver, red and white disc while riding in car on way to campsite.  it hovered over the trees and disappeared as we drove away.

content.detailedDescription: It came strate down at a thound miles an hour then stoped then came toward us turning red than blue it came toward us than stoped and went straght up at a thousand miles an hour
content.summary: Itb turned blue than red over&over

content.detailedDescription: At  4:35am, march 30, 2008, i witnessed on my way to work just staring at the sky while travelling south bound on highway 37/interstate 69 just north of 96th street (approx. ��� mile) in the indianapolis/fishers (in) area an unusual light pattern.  i first thought this may have been an electrical occurrence in some power lines, but realised that there are no power lines on my route. the light was a low intensity, translucent, white to very light blue in color, and oblong in shape. the size was similar to that of a beach ball, maybe a little bigger. the light rapidly moved north at my guess of 100+mph perpendicular to the outside shoulder of the northbound lanes; its altitude was approximately 30��� above the ground. i saw no object related to the light, but the light seemed to pulse/flash at every length of its width in travel, a very rapid pulse considering the speed that i surmised. i tried to keep view of the object, but travelling at 60mph myself and crossing a lane inadvertently (then trying to regain my control of my vehicle) i lost sight of the light. this all seemed to last no more than 3-4 seconds of me witnessing it.
content.summary: Pulsating light in the indianapolis, in area

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen two, both very different types of ufo's.
this is the first one.
    i was coming home very early a.M. from visiting my husband who was hospitalized for several months. i was approx. 24 yrs old. i had the baby sitter and my son with me. as i got out of the car i looked up as light caught my attention, i yelled at lori "do you see that?" we both watched in awe for a short time and it than went up and dissapeared.
it had red lights, was very close to us, had white lights. and was hovering. we felt a small amount of strange heat. this was winter for us.With snow all around us. but it left as the craft left. i reported it to people than and only got laughed at.

the second sighting: sometime in 1900 approx. my husband again in hospital, my son approx age was 17. we were riding talking to one another about his dad, when we both noticed this very large ovular very lit up object hovering over the drug and alcohol rehabilitation center that was all lit up. we both got out of the car, and saw the bridgewater fireman at a nearby pond filling up their tankers, almost as in slow motion, in the lot above was a baseball team playing ball, we couldn't hear any noise from any of them, very odd. very warm sensation hit us both, and we both thought how odd it was that all around us seemed in slow motion and quiet.
we watched for quite some time how long i do not know. we stood watching as it appeared to be hovering, only slight movement. shortly after we started walking towards it, as we did it rose and started coming towards us, my son was really scared so we went back to our car, and as we did, it went up and looked to slide sideways in the air. this object was huge, it was over powering the building it sat above and that building is huge. there were a lot of lights  on in the building and we wondered if somehow this was attracting it. well it was a long time ago, but to this day i do believe there is another life form or being watching us. we have seen many strange things since, but never as close up as these two. so i saw your article and said what the heck i'll tell you about it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Got out of car and it was hovering over my driveway and home

content.detailedDescription: If everyone that was there feels comfortable with me elaborating then i will. until then, i wish not to do so.  i just discovered this site and did not know that sites like this ever existed.
content.summary: Hole sky lite up green, to the point that it covered the whole town. all we could see was green everywhere. lasted for 15 secounds then was gone

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were outside on our farm at approximately 6:30 p.M. on december 6, 2007 and heard the sound of jet fighter engines overhead, flying in formation from north to south, however the fighters were not seen. 

 looking to the north of the farm, towards the jackson county municipal airport, we observed a multitude of flickering lights, flashing from north to south then east to west then back to north and south.  the lights had the appearance of a childs sparkler.  there was no sound. this sighting lasted approximately 20 to 30 minutes. 

immediately east to the farm, i saw two single spotlight type lights in the trees. one flash, then the lights were out.  

a few minutes later as we were still observing the night sky, in the distance east of our farm, we observed an extremely large cylinder shaped "object" with four large yellow/orange colored lights.  these lights were nothing like we had seen before in all previous sighting reports. initially, one might think these lights were a rear auto/truck/aircraft assembly but the size at arms length were the size of four large spotlights in single formation. the lights flashed twice, possibly 15 to 30 seconds in duration then went out completely. there is another farm to the east of ours with a barn.  the lights were directly above the barn, possibly 400 to 500 ft.   volk air force base is approximately 60 miles nearby.  

i might mention, this is the first time i personally felt goosebumps and an initial sense of fear. one of the witnesses with me who is normally a skeptic, said " what in the heck was that"?  she now believes she saw something, but cannot explain. shortly afterwards, our curiousity got the best of us and we drove to the area we believe the lights were sighted to "investigate" and found nothing.  

one of the witnesses spoke to a neighbor a few days later and he also say the same object move directly over his home the same evening.
content.summary: Sighting of large orange/yellowish lights - jackson county wisconsin

content.detailedDescription: Felt compelled to look out the back door and saw the lights out on the horizon. this has been occuring since september 2007. this is the best footage that i have captured to date of my sightings. it started with 2 or 3 lights in the sky, very bright and seem to be strobing blue red and white. sometimes orangeish color. these lights blink on, out of nowhere and hover or stay stationary in the sky for minutes at a time. they make formations and then depart. most of my activity is at sunset on the west horizon. as big as the star sirius. twice as bright and different colors.
content.summary: Numerous lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was a deep red color and about the size of a softball. i was standing in the front yard when i seen it in the field across the road. it moved very slowly across the tree line. it took about 15 minutes for it to get across.
content.summary: Was the size a softball and a very deep red

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2055 on march 29th 2008 my wife and i were taking a break between two movies we were watching.  my wife went for a potty break and i stepped out on the back steps.  skies were clear, temp at 15 degrees and as usual on a clear montana night, the stars were very bright.  i was watching a jet flying to the south that was heading west, could see the usual red and green beacons flashing.  i turned to look north and caught a very bright light almost directly over head, watched the light moving from south west to the north east.  realizing the size and brightness of the light(about 1/2 the size of a dime at arms length), with no beacons to be seen, i called for my wife.  she came out and also watched the light.  it was moving at a steady rate, more at a downward trajectory than away from us.  i asked my wife to compare it to the airplane with the beacons still in view and blinking.  she did and could not make out any similairities with the light above and moving away from us.  together we watched the light fade away, which took maybe three to five seconds.  the total sighting lasted for at least 2 minutes.  after the light faded out, no beacons or anything for that matter could be seen.  there was no streaking effect with this light, no beacons, no sound(we listend for aircraft sound for a couple of minutes later).  we see shooting stars and all types of aircraft all of the time in our skys, but nothing like this before.
content.summary: Brilliant white light moving southwest to northeast, fades out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling out of my driveway at 5635 cascade road, grand rapids, mi, when i felt an urge to pull to the side of the road, get out of the car and look up. i saw what looked like a b29 bomber hovering above the back field about 200 feet from me at about 45���. i was awe struck, amazed and a bit freaked out to see this plane hovering for more than 5 minutes. i saw the four propellers turning but it was silent. it was a dark gray in tone with no markings. after about 6 minutes i became board, thinking to myself to leave, just then it began to move forward very slowly. i watched for a couple more minutes as it moved about twice it's length. i would be late for work so i got back in my car and headed down the road. about a quarter mile down the road i stopped again, perplexed. i figured the plane would be seen again after i lost view of it over a small wooded lot that obstructed my view. i never appeared on the other side of the woods.

i passed it off as some sort of new military plane. i didn't know then that they had retired those planes in the 1960s. it has bugged me for years. i often wonder if i was experiencing some time warp. or maybe an alien encounter.

i recently heard someone else call into coast to coast am and report a similar incident that happened to them in illinois. theres was a cargo plane with propellers, silent, but theirs was said to be somewhat transparent. my plane was solid. i do recall that.

thank you for giving me an opportunity to report my experience.
content.summary: B-29 bomber hovering

content.detailedDescription: During the summer of 2005, a bright sunny day, i was driving on i-95 at approx. 3:00 pm in a northeasternly direction coming from new york city and headed towards connecticut state when i saw a short white plume of what appeared to be like the exhaust of a military jet fighter of some kind at extremely high altitute. this is nothing unusual, but it caught my attention because i thought that it was at an extremely high altitude. i remember thinking that this jet had to be flying at least 70,000 - 80,000 feet up in the sky. (this is only my guess, i have no idea how high it was flying) i couldn't see the plane just a short white stream in its wake. this jet, what i thought was a military jet, was flying in a westernly direction, it then made a sudden 90 degree turn now going north and up. i could clearly see the perfect "l" shaped white plume and i thought, "wow, this could be my first ufo sighting" it then just disappeared. i never gave it another thought until now that i decided to check your web site for the first time and i see a lot of reports from a significant number of people, but compared to other reports, my story probably means nothing.
content.summary: White tail

content.detailedDescription: I took this photo and another one toward the northeast and ohio river_from flatwoods kentucky_that shows very anomalous shaped objects 34 seconds apart, and really close together, on august19, 2007. camera is canon powershot a550 7.1 mp. i take alot of random night photos, then just dump them off into my pc without looking at them till later. i did notice the green light that apparently was the horseshoe shaped object_that i passed of as atmospheric glow on a star..I did not see the 2 smaller glowing objects and green orbs. all objects were basically framed between 2 trees that were not even 60 feet away from me.I guess i just overlooked this one and the other when i reviewed my photos a few days later i was going through my photos a few  days ago and seen the specks of light, decided to zoom for a closer look and i was like wow!!!!!  i have a horseshoe shaped object attached to this report as well as diamond/cone and square shaped objects with greenish orb like objects that are closer in my next report and photos. everyone that has seen them are completely blown away.  this photo and the other photo with the diamond_square and green orb objects were taken 3 days after my initial photo and report of 8 possible ufos  which was submitted in late aug.. i was at my house ouside by my porch when i took this and the next one. i cannot believe that ive had these photographs in my computer and on my camera card for 7 months and didnt even know it!!!! i added 2 enlargements as well as the original. in my original you can see the edge of my porch roof as well, but the craft is only a specks of light until you zoom in a little.. i will be submitting this report with the first object that i photographed including enlargements. i will submit another report following this with photos from the 2nd objects that were photographed 34 seconds after this object which it and its enlargements are attached to this report.   thanks very much.......Mark corbin.
content.shape: Cone,  Diamond,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other
content.summary: I was photographing the night sky on aug..19.2007 and apparently took photographs of extreme unknown aerial objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was at santa monica beach with a friend of mine and wanted to catch the sun before we headed back to the san francisco bay area. we were laying down and i was watching the airplanes above us. i then thought to myself "wouldnt it be something to see a ufo right now..." around 5 minutes after i had that thought, i saw a silver sphere-like object in the northwest side of the sky. i asked my friend if she saw what i was looking at and she did. 2 airplanes then criss-crossed it so it gave me an idea how big and low it was. it was flying low, it was silent, and had a decent glow. it then made 90 degree turns slowly towards us. we then realized it wasnt man made, nothing i've ever seen before could move like that and how slowly it kept its pace. then it was directly above us. it was meticulous and precise. it was like it calculated it move directly above us. i somehow felt it was trying to communicate with me. suddenly fear swept over me since i didnt know what it was going to do. then all the fear went away and felt overwhelmed and amazed at what was happening. my friend was going to record it but she felt the sun was too bright since it was 95 degrees outside. then i thought to myself " show me something that nothing that i know of can do." right after that, the light that was emmitting from the object slowly started to fade and then it disappeared. my friend said "oh my god did you see that! it just dissapeared!" i told her of what i telepathically told them to do and she was shocked. we sat up and noticed that everyone around was oblivious as to what happened and out of everyone at the beach that day we were the only ones that saw them.

for the past few months,ive been reading exquisite material on ufos and their ancient presence on earth. i have been having extreme, vivid, colorful and intense dreams everynight. for some reason i feel this recent awareness has led me to have a deeper consciousness on the world and universe around us. dont be afraid to watch the skies!!
content.summary: Santa monica beach, ca 1:30 pm, march 23,2008

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 2000 me and two friends were in the woods about a mile from our neighborhood we had built a club house and were working on it, it was in the biggest tree with the most branches we could find and really high off the ground i was inside and my friend rooney was on the roof when he told me and my other friend that was on the ground that he sees three helicoptors hovering over the swamp the clubhouse or treehouse whatever you wanna call it was on the edge of where the swamp began so we both climed on the roof with him and we thought it was helicoptors also because it was shinning a search light on the swamp when all of a sudden one of the crafts did about a 15 mile circle in about a second and started flying in a pattern above us going back and forth and up and down and didnt make any noise it was so crazy i couldnt even talk i would swear in court we seen it and all the sudden it just shot off into space i dont know what happened to the other crafts cause after that one was gone we didnt see the other two we was paying to much attendtion to the one ever since then i spent a bonch of ours trying to spot it again this time on camera so i could have proof but i never seen it again i never believed in ufos before that but now i do and anyone who sees what we seen would believe in them to the government has to know about what they really are, some people we tell about it they try to tell us it was just a secret goernment craft but if that true what the hell are they doing still using rockets if they have such crafts i really think it was from another world and if makes me sick that the government would keep such a thing from us they are like little children with a secret and if they ell us it wont be a secret no more they need to grow up and tell us the truth about our brothers from the stars
content.summary: Me and 2 of my friends thought it was a helicopter at first cause it was shinning a search light on the ground but all the sudden it shot above us so fast we knew it was something we never seen before

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the pool at a condo in highland beach with my mom and wife, i went to sit with my wife and my mother in the shade. i laid down with my head resting on my wifes legs. my eyes were toward the sky, i put my hands & arm so the suns rays were not directly in my eyes. i saw two objects in the distant blue sky.
the objects had a whitish tone to them and at times had a cross like appearance with one of the lengths a little bit longer, almost like looking at a white aircraft from below. the objects were farther apart in the begining at a position about 12:00 in the sky, basically stationary, then they got a little closer and were at about 1:00, a little more north of the original position, but not much.
the objects were moving upward more than anything, but at a slow pace. they were not balloons, they were not effected by any upper air currents as they were not moving erractically, also i have never seen baloons that had a cross like shape, just to be noted for the good ole' skeptic.
as they were ascending a few planes had passed below, the objects were much farther out and now not looking so much like a plane as the were not traveling horizontally. as they got farther away they appeared to become longer, lost the crosslike appearance and had more of a cigar shape. it is possible that the naked eye could not see the shorter part of the cross like appearance as the objects got farther away. after looking at the objects continuosly for about 15 minutes or so, a thin cloud started to obscure my view, and eventually over came the objects, i then decided to leave and did not see them again.
content.summary: Two objects ascending at very slow pace approximatly 20,000 - 30,000+ft

content.detailedDescription: Ok, this happened a while back and has just been eating at me. now let me tell you this sighting occurred right on eglin afb so it maybe some new technology, but...It was a very clear morning in the sunshine state and i am driving to work when i look up at about a 45 degree angle through the left side of my windsheild and a gold football shaped object appears in the sky. it was motionless and then seemed to roll over backwards and disappear. it just appeared and then disappeared. i say football shaped instead of a blimp because it was thicker in the middle as it tapered to each end. this took all of 4 seconds, but has left quite an impression.
content.summary: Gold football shape disappeared.
Landing of a half domed craft with 3 lighted panels that were incapsulated in the dome, bright red to orange like the sun

content.detailedDescription: See cms report by david marchant sr. asd/mufonga
content.summary: Landing of a  half domed shaped object with 3 lighted panels that were red to orange color incapsulated in the dome

content.detailedDescription: I was a supervisor in a iocal rubber factory (goshenb rubber co.)when a employee (dick dance) who was on supper break, called me outside to look at what was coming toward us.  due to the bright security lights outside the shop we could not see the whole shape of the craft.  what we did see was part of a circle with solid windows or openings in it.  there was a red background light inside the craft.  while we watched we could see several silohuetted figures moving about, one even looked over the railing edge and appeared to be looking in our direction.  whatever it was was moving along at a leisurely pace of approximately 10 mph. and approx. 200 ft. to 300 ft. from the ground. i could see that as it floated along it did not have a smooth float, but seemed to wobble on its axis.  the vehicle was moving from the northwest to the southeast.  all this took place after 8 p.M. and it was dark outside and was unable to determine the sized of the craft.  i have kept this pretty much to myself over the years due to the jibbing that i had received for even mentioning it.  i have always been a structured type of individual and tell things as they are.  i have given you approximate dates on the sighting as i had never written this event down. ps: the window that the figure was looking down from was sloped out at the top and bottom forming a v shape.
content.summary: You could see the curve of lthe craft and it had windows with a redbackground and silohuetted figures moving about.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out back to have a smoke and looked up and saw a dimely lit uneven triangle with about 8 to 10 lights moving to fast to be anything that it could have been. what i mean about uneven is that one side had 7 lights and the other side had 2 or three lights.
it moved left a little then back right but the other parts of it as the center moved kept perfect pace with it. but the other parts moved around and back and forth but made the exact turns that the center did.
then it was just too far away too fast to see anymore.
it was unbelievable. beind my house is a flight path for airplanes and i see them constantly. there were also planes around that looked as if they were standing still compared to the speed that this or these things had.
there were no clouds last night so i know it wasn't what my wife said it was when i told her, a light... i know better!!!
with it moving so fast, there would have never have been time to photgraph it. i know someone else in the area had to see it. it was like it was following the river the way it was moving.
there is an airport reallt close to my house. they had to see it on radar!
content.summary: Uneven triangle moving very fast moving around and making weird turns but following the lead light

content.detailedDescription:
I tried to make a video but was unable.
same spot as last time. mines rd. north of laredo.
at 9:00 i was watching the sky just below the big dipper.
i had binoculars, night vision goggles, and my camera.
at 9:30 the lights just kind of "appered" in that area. i didn't see them move into the area.
there were three or four. one would blink four or five times, then one or two would blink. 
the lights started moving south for a bit. then stay in one place.
they moved around each other almost a circule.
the movment looked very slow and because the lights were dark more than not it was hard to track.
after four minutes from first sighting they started moving north at the same speed and disapeared from my veiw.
on 3-28-08 i was unable to see them but after about an hour of looking, not stedy jusy looking when i could, i came apon an oilfield truck stopped on the road. the driver asked me what those lights were? i asked were he saw them and he pointed at the area of the big bipper and said, six blinking lights, over san antonio. 
san antonio is north of us about that dirrection.
he then said, if anyone asks me i'll say i saw an oilrig flair.
he did not want to give me his name.

later one of my co-workers said he saw them too.
he asked me outright if i thought they were ufos. well they are unidentified, flying and objects.
he tried looking at them with a thumal camera but they didn't show up.
he also did not want to make a report.
once again i'm only trying to add a dot of info to anyone elses report.
almost missed adding this. oilfield worker said one object had emited a blue "flaim" like tail for a few seconds.
content.summary: Blinking lights move south then north.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching tv joking with my husband how it was such a clear night to be ufo watching. (yes, we are going to start doing this since i have been seeing unexplained objects in our skies lately!)i was standing at my big window when i saw one bright orange light in the sky that sharply turned right (my left)or i guess it would be east. i didn't say a thing to my husband until it came back a second time in the same location. i gave my husband the strangest look as he was sitting on the couch. he told me that i was seeing things and that these things would not come back a second time!!(first occurrance was on march 6th at 8:02p sharp). he got up and couldn't believe his eyes. shortly after the first 2 orbs just towards the west we saw a linear line of 4 lights just above tree top height. these lights came on one at a time and dimmed one at a time but were much closer together and not as bright reddish/orange this time. (as the march 6th incident). i would say that the lights/orbs looked much different and acted much different almost as if it was a coverup. i was not scared by these lights. nothing really eerie about them. i called my sister north in rochester as i was outside this time watching these things. she was on her cell phone and walked outside as i was telling her to see these things. she said "oh my god! i see three lights. they look like head lights on a car in the sky." as i watched these lights come and go they moved fairly slowly towards the east. i did notice a huge amount of jets in the skies this time but no sounds whatsoever. the incident only lasted maybe 15 minutes. if it's a clear night tonight, you bet i'm going to be watching the skies. if you are in northern indiana, i suggest that you do too. i need to know what these things are!! who is doing this and confusing the public. or is this a governmental cover up? what i saw on march 6th does not compare to these lights at all!!
content.summary: Saw orange orbs in culver's skies again last night!!!

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:05 pm i was outside looking at the stars when i saw 2 to 3 red blinking lights.  when i looked closer i noticed that there was 8 to 10 red blinking lights in a triangular formation.  they appeared to be high and fairly spread apart but kept the triangular formation.  

there was a single plane flying in the same direction what seemed to be seconds after i lost sight of the red triangle shaped lights.
content.summary: Approximately 8 to 10 red blinking lights in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the beach having a bonfire the sky was clear it was about 8:30 or 9 pm, and i was looking up at the stars. i noticed the small red looking light (star?) and thought that it started moving. then i noticed it was areally bright light that was moving not the red light. it was moving northward and it seemed to be moving pretty fast. i had everyone look up and we were trying to figure out what it was and as it was moving across the sky heading to the  north it quickly changed directions and started moving eastward, it didnt turn it moved quickly to the east and we continued watching it as it dissapeared into the sky it appeared to disapear into the stars i watched it untill it could no longer be seen. 
we all deducted that it moved too fast and changed direction to fast to be a plane also it was such a bright white light. we all tried to come up with a logical answer to what we were seeing but all we could figure out is what it wasnt a plane, a sattelite, a comet...... would love to know what it was
content.summary: Bright light moving fast northward

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to talk on my cordless phone and sat on the edge of the porch. looking up, to the south, i saw an orange, bright star like object moving briskly , going north. at first i figured it was an airplane, but i noticed it had no blinking lights and was moving very swiftly. the light from it wasn't pulsing or anything either. it wasn't making any noise, and it is a clear night. i called for my wife, who came out and also observed it. it went right over our house, and passed the edge of our roof out of view. i ran into the yard and caught a glimpse of it before it completely disappeared. it had no blinking lights, but i got the impression it's altitude wasn't very high.
content.summary: Bright orange silent venus sized object moving south to north over home, fairly fast, appeared fairly low
